resources.string: Not yet Registered? Sign Up Here!

You can order by 1 of these 2 ways. Follow one which you prefer.
1.With Prescription : In the Cart section, there is a button SELECT , by clicking it you can select a photo of your prescription. 
After selecting, a dialog box will appear where you put a name and details of your prescription content so that we can deliver accordingly your instructions. 

How to write details : Suppose your prescription has 2 medicines enlisted, Napa, Paracetamol. You can write this way, Napa Tablet 1 strip or Napa 10 tablets, Paracetamol 1 strip or 10 tablets. 
After completing these, click UPLOAD button below and your order is sent. 

2.By creating order Yourself : In Home section, click CREATE ORDER there will be a dialog box where you put your necessary information about your medicine like name, company name, power, type and quantity. 

Please remember this quantity indicates individual quantity of a medicine. For example, if you input 10 quantity, you will get 10 tablets/capsules etc. Where as if you need one ointment, input 1 in the quantity and Ointment in the Type section
